title: Sign In (Login) - Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to MLB.com Home Page
-Prod: https://www.mlb.com
-Beta: https://beta-aws.mlb.com (Beta cookie/credentials needed prior for environment access)


AND clicks on the MLB.tv icon anywhere on the page
AND is redirected to MLB.tv login page

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19765)
custom_steps:
WHEN uses a Premium Yearly login credentials:  TVYEARLY18@GMAIL.COM | Password1
AND logs in successfully
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be granted appropriate access to feeds on the video page and URL structure will have /tv (https://beta-aws.mlb.com/tv or https://www.mlb.com/tv)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19774)

title: MLB.TV Access Point - Homepage
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on MLB.com home page
-Prod: https://www.mlb.com
-Beta: https://beta-aws.mlb.com (Beta cookie/credentials needed prior for environment access)
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking on MLB.tv icon next to game displays

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19742)

IF user is logged in
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be redirected to MLB.TV video page appropriately
-Prod: https://www.mlb.com/tv
-Beta: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/tv

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19775)


OR ELSE if not logged in
THEN redirected to MLB.tv secure login page

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19765)

title: MLB.tv Logo - Redirects to Media Center
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND is on the MLB.tv video page
ie: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/tv/g529745 (Value of "g" is dynamic and changes per game)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on the MLB.TV logo on the top left of header

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19534)
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be redirected to the respective environment Media Center page.

-QA: https://qa-aws.mlb.com/live-stream-games
-Beta: https://beta-aws.mlb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe
-Prod: https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games

title: Play/Pause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND selects an archived and/or VOD (video on demand) feed from Media Center
ie: https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games

AND user clicks on the back arrow next to the date to view previous day's games
AND clicks on the blue link next to the MLB.tv icon 
AND is redirected to MLB.tv video page appropriately with content playback
ie: https://www.mlb.com/tv
custom_steps:
WHEN the user hovers within the player, they will see the following player controls
(Standard - Play/pause, back 10 secs, volume control)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19579)

AND the user clicks Play/Pause
custom_expected: THEN the video will play/pause accordingly

title: Jog Back 10 Sec
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND selects an archived and/or VOD (video on demand) feed from Media Center
ie: https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games

AND user clicks on the back arrow next to the date to view previous day's games
AND clicks on the blue link next to the MLB.tv icon 
AND is redirected to MLB.TV video page appropriately with content playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user hovers within the player, they will see the following player controls
(Standard - Play/pause, back 10 secs, volume control)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19579)


WHEN the user clicks Rewind 10s
custom_expected: THEN the feed will jump back 10 seconds in gameplay

title: Volume: Mute and unmuted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND selects an archived and/or VOD (video on demand) feed from Media Center
ie: https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games

AND user clicks on the back arrow next to the date to view previous day's games
AND clicks on the blue link next to the MLB.tv icon 
AND is redirected to MLB.TV video page appropriately with content playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user hovers within the player, they will see the following player controls
(Standard - Play/pause, back 10 secs, volume control)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19579)


WHEN the user clicks the volume icon
custom_expected: THEN the volume icon will display a small x (muted) and none when unmuted.

title: Play/Pause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND the user is on any of the Access points (homepage, scores or media center) 
AND clicks on the MLB.tv icon a Live game
AND is redirected to MLB.TV video page appropriately with content playback
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Pause/Play button
custom_expected: THEN the video should Pause/Play accordingly

title: Live - Will advance to live game state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND the user is on any of the Access points (homepage, scores or media center) 
AND clicks on the MLB.tv icon a Live game
AND is redirected to MLB.TV video page appropriately with content playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the red LIVE button on the right of the timeline

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19779)
custom_expected: THEN scrubber the user to the Live-most point in the game
